survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Station Networks Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and experiences with public and private electric vehicle charging station networks to help improve service offerings and infrastructure planning.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public electric vehicle (EV) charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the options cover all potential usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public electric vehicle (EV) charging stations?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting an EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox with a limit of 3 selections to prioritize key factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with max selections set to 3.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting an EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of EV charging stations in your area?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of EV charging stations in your area?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in EV charging station networks?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in EV charging station networks?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for faster charging speeds at public stations?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge willingness to pay. Keep options simple.
